ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - The End Times - Daemons
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWI
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Warhammer themed Daemons into Rimworld. The Chaos Daemons function similar to mechanoids in core RimWorld. They are not a playable faction, but a hidden faction that will always be hostile to the player.
The Rimhammer mods should be placed at the bottom of your mod list. Place the base Rimhammer - The End Times mod at the bottom, followed by the Rimhammer - The End Times: Magic mod, then put the race/faction mods under it (order doesn't matter for the race faction mods, as long as they are loaded after the base Rimhammer and Rimhammer Magic mods).
IF YOU HAVE ISSUES, YOU'LL GET A MUCH FASTER RESPONSE BY POSTING ON MY DISCORD ISSUES-AND-BUGS CHANNEL: https://discord.gg/UCmQbCT
Dev Notes:
0.0.0.1 2025-03-22 ======================== First release.
0.0.0.1 2023-07-01 ======================== Development started.
